overview: Sometimes you need to employ a little deception to get what you want. Whether you're trying to catch your boyfriend cheating on you; encourage your married, straight neighbor to take a walk on the wild side; or just get around your crush's habit of only fucking younger men, there are times when hiding behind a mask can be the key to getting to know what's real. And for Diego Sans, William Seed, Thyle, Alex Mecum, Dante Colle, Ryan Bones, and D.O., it's when the mask cums off that things really get interesting!
title: Cheaters
